Content: WOW WOW WOW! There are lots of timer apps that crashes as soon as you press back. This app, has supernatural powers or what? It *never* crashes. Like we pause the time and sometimes have to go so can you make a column of total time we spent in between (actual time+paused time) Else your app is literally best 🙌🙌 already suggested to all my friends!!!
